Title: InterDILI: drug-induced injury prediction
Description: This model has been trained on a publicly available collection of 5 datasets manually curated for drug-induced-liver-injury (DILI). DILI outcome has been binarised, and ECFP descriptors, together with physicochemical properties have been used to train a random forest classifier which achieves AUROC > 0.9
Interpretation: Probability of Drug-Induced Liver Injury (DILI), higher score indicates higer risk
